popup.title: Fusion Live Assist
popup.acceptWebcam: Please allow LiveAssist to access your webcam by clicking 'Allow' above.

notice.noAgents: There are currently no agents available. Please try again.
notice.navigateAwayAssist: You have gone to a page without Live Assist. Your video and voice are still being transmitted to the Live Assist agent while this window is open.
notice.userMediaError: Failed to get access to the microphone/camera. You may need to check your browser settings to allow access.
notice.promptToAllowScreenShare: Would you like to enable sharing of your current browser window?
notice.promptToAllowPushedDocument: The agent would like to send you a document.  Would you like to view it?

error.noWebRTC: Sorry, your browser does not appear to support WebRTC.
error.popupBlocked: Your browser has blocked a pop-up window required for Live Assist to work. Please allow pop-ups from this site, and reload this page.

shareFail.message: __targetType__ that the agent has attempted to share with you has failed to load.

alerts.docPushToUnsupportedPage: You cannot push documents if the consumer is not on an Assist enabled page.

cobrowsing.active: This page is currently being shared.

ie.installRequired: A plugin is required to use Live Assist with Internet Explorer. Please download and install the plugin to proceed.
ie.upgradeRequired: A plugin upgrade is required to use Live Assist. Your current version is __installedVersion__, however version __latestAvailableVersion__ is required. Please upgrade the plugin and restart your browser to continue.
ie.upgradeOptional: A plugin upgrade is available for Live Assist. Your current version is __installedVersion__, however version __latestAvailableVersion__ is available.

safari.installRequired: A plugin is required to use Live Assist with Safari. Please download and install the plugin and restart your browser once the install has completed.
safari.upgradeRequired: A plugin upgrade is required for Live Assist. Your current version is __installedVersion__, however version __latestAvailableVersion__ is required. Please upgrade the plugin and restart your browser to continue.
safari.upgradeOptional: A plugin upgrade is available for Live Assist. Your current version is __installedVersion__, however version __latestAvailableVersion__ is available.
